name: Scribble Gem Hunter
description:
You want to buy that new scribble-system but you don't have enough gems! Go hop in your space-ship and blast a few asteroids (and maybe a few friendly ships) and collect those gems! What out for those space rocks though, they hurt! (Ships and their explosions can really mess up your day as well!)

CONTROLS:
Use your mouse to move

Click LMB to fire.

This small game was made in 4 days for the Scribble Jam.
I had fun making this game, it was very rushed but it was a good refresher as I get back into game making.  The art was fun too, it was a crazy relaxed style where I limited my pallet to 4 colors.

The challenges I was going for include:

What did you say?: All text in your game must be a made-up language

Never Stop: The player is always moving

2 Bit Color: You can only use 4 different colors.

[Keyboard Broken]: You can only use your mouse as an input
